name: Luck Determines Fate
description:
You play as a square, trying to keep your fate as great as possible, because it's constantly getting worse.

The one classic tool you have is a gun, which will kill your enemies, and better your fate.

You can also collect jam (the weird thing with the smily face), which will worsen or better your fate randomly.

Meters

Above the game, you will see a few meters.

The first one represents your fate. A fate of 100 represents great fate, and a fate of 10 represents bad fate. You start off with a fate of 100,  getting the death screen when it reaches 0.

The second meter represents how worse your fate gets per second. It's 4 at the start, and as you kill more enemies, it starts decreasing.

The last meter represents how long you've survived.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move

Left mouse button to shoot

Player rotates towards the mouse

Features

Your aiming skills get worse and when your fate decreases, and you get slower, and as well as getting faster when your fate increases, with better aiming skills.

The death screen [SPOILER]s you when you die and shows how long you've survived, and how many kills you got.

Bugs

After retrying, an enemy bullet may hit you.

Good luck, I guess, and don't die.
